changelog.title: CLH-003: Pattern Hunting
changelog.description: Hunt for hidden codes using grep. Extract 'Secret Code: 42XDFL' from mystery.txt.

changelog.title: CLH-004: Process Investigation
changelog.description: Identify malicious 'unknown_process' hiding among legitimate system processes.

changelog.title: CLH-005: Log Analysis
changelog.description: Analyze system logs to find error patterns. Complete the foundation tier (CLH-001 to CLH-005).
